SEARCH
Package command

Class Ui

java.lang.Object
command.Ui
public class Ui extends Object
Handles all user interactions for the chatbot, including displaying messages and reading commands.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Ui()
    Constructs a new Ui object with a Scanner to read user input.
